name: Voliday
description:
Voliday is a city builder that unfolds on a tropical island. Your goal is to make the island prosper by catering to tourists and exploiting the unique resources of the volcanic island.

Voliday is a student video-game project done as part of the curriculum of the SAE Institute of Geneva. As part of the 3rd bachelor year’s curriculum, students of the Games Programming section of the school are tasked with creating a video-game over the span of 7 months (end of september to end of april). This is the result of this endeavor that has involved 14 programmers, 13 game artists and 6 sound designers.
